full_summary:
=================================
### Eaton UPS Batteries for DND - Amendment 003

#### Project Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires Eaton UPS batteries, or equivalent, for its locations at (1) Cold Lake, Alberta, (2) Bagotville, Quebec, and (3) Trenton, Ontario. The Request for Quotations (RFQ) document outlines the complete details regarding this requirement.

#### Key Changes

As of Amendment 003, two key updates have been made:

*   The document "Question and Answer – Part 2 - Question et réponse – partie 2 (2022-12-19)" has been published.
*   The solicitation closing date has been extended to December 21, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST.

#### Bid Submission Requirements
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, bids must be submitted electronically through the Contracting Authority's email. Faxed and hard-copy bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract. The bidder must submit pricing in accordance with Annex A – List of Deliverables and Pricing.

#### Languages
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or requests for clarification, please contact Agnes Kowalska at:

*   agnes.kowalska@ ssc-spc.gc.ca
*   Phone: 343-551-9034

#### Invitation to Bid
Shared Services Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a bid for this requirement. Interested suppliers must register on the Government of Canada's Bid Posting System to access the RFQ document.

#### Additional Information
The RFQ document, along with the applicable attachments, can be found at:

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/7D04E6B4-57DE-456A-A3A3-DEB02E884742

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/86B3FC9D-1FF0-4E56-BB85-776EA8D3A1DA

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/5EDF5471-6FFB-4D13-ABF6-21B707C8CDE8
